channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Venture firm CRV raises $750M, downsizing after returning capital to investors
item.description: The 55-year-old VC firm announced its twentieth fund.

item.title: WIRED Roundup: ChatGPT Goes Full Demon Mode
item.description: On today’s episode of Uncanny Valley, our senior business editor joins us to talk Meta, brain aging, and ChatGPT’s recent dark turn.

item.title: Itch.io Is Restoring NSFW Games—as Long as They’re Free
item.description: Facing pressure from payment processors, the indie game platform delisted many adult titles this week. Itch.io began offering free NSFW content again ...

item.title: Kleiner Perkins is having a very good week
item.description: With two IPOs this week alone, Kleiner Perkins partner Mamoon Hamid has reason to celebrate.

item.title: Inside Jeffrey Epstein’s Forgotten AI Summit

item.title: Google bets on STAN, an Indian social gaming platform

item.title: Tesla partly liable in Florida Autopilot trial, jury awards $200M in damages
item.description: The jury verdict is one of the first major legal decisions about driver assistance technology that has gone against Tesla. Both Elon Musk and Tesla ha...

item.title: A backlog at the Commerce Department is reportedly stalling Nvidia’s H20 chip licenses

item.title: Tesla Found Partly Liable in 2019 Autopilot Death
item.description: A Miami jury has ordered the automaker to pay up to $243 million after finding that the Tesla vehicle had a “defect.” It's the first time Tesla has be...

item.title: Anthropic Revokes OpenAI's Access to Claude
item.description: OpenAI lost access to the Claude API this week after Anthropic claimed the company was violating its terms of service.
